titles: Regi suo post bis septennium in patriam ex Angliâ redeunti, Scotiae gratulatio
author: Hume, David, 1560?-1630?
notes: Dedication signed: David Humis (i.e. David Hume).
A poem written on the occasion of James I's return to Scotland.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: James --  I, --  King of England, 1566-1625 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
